comment: The addition of the next term in a finite sum of ` A ( k ) ` is the current term plus ` B ` i.e. ` A ( N + 1 ) ` . (Contributed by NM, 4-Nov-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2014.)
